title: How to Unlock Blooper and Hammer Bro. in Mario Party 8

steps.title: Select the Star Battle Arena in the main menu.
steps.content: Select the Star Battle Arena in the main menu.

steps.title: Complete the whole Star Battle.
steps.content: Complete the whole Star Battle. Once you do you will unlock one of either Hammer Bro. or Blooper, the Squid.

steps.title: Complete Star Battle a second time.
steps.content: Complete Star Battle a second time. Do the star battle again once more. When you get there press continue. Then you will get the character that you did not get last time.
